import React, { Component, lazy, Suspense } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; class CadastrarUsuario extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onRadioBtnClick = this.onRadioBtnClick.bind(this); this.state = { fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', bithdate:'', sex: '', radioSelected: 2, }; } clearFields = () => { this.setState({ fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', birthdate:'', sex: '' }); } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.id]: event.target.value }); } onRadioBtnClick(radioSelected) { if(radioSelected.target.id) this.setState({ radioSelected: radioSelected, }); console.log(radioSelected.target.value); console.log(this.state.sex); } render() { return (
Cadastrar novo usu√°rio
 
); } } export default CadastrarUsuario;
